attributes.action: Abolish FUEL DUTY on fuel used to get to work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We pay road tax, we pay income tax, we pay VAT on fuel, we pay duty on fuel.  We travel to work and even before we've sat at our desks, we've paid about £200+ in tax per month on getting to work!  Does this sound fair?  We should not pay any tax when travelling to work to pay tax!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish FUEL DUTY on fuel used to get to work."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17810


Prime Minister's Office
